snippet.title: Ara: History Untold Game Overview | Xbox Direct 2024
snippet.description:
Ara: History Untold comes from veteran Civilization developers. Xbox January 2024's Developer Direct gave a look into the all new strategy sim, with hopes to break some of the stigma surrounding the genre, and make the most accessible strategy sim yet. Ara: History Untold from Oxide Games is expected to release fall 2024.

#arahistoryuntold #xbox
